extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject

      • connectionListenerSubjectInServer

        public void connectionListenerSubjectInServer(RMIClientInterface rmiClientInterface)
                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Called by the RMI client to check for a connection lost. When this method interrupts the client knows the connection has been lost.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        rmiClientInterface - the client checking for connection lost.
